column4: Welp, I'm having no luck installing ubuntu without a CD. and to be quite honest it sounds kind of risky.. I did manage to find a blank CD though.. Could anyone recommend me a good, free, CD burner for windows? I'll hopefully only need it once :P
did you try from a usb stick?
there is a program called etubootin which can make a bootable usb stick with ubuntu on it
you could do puppy that small, but Ubuntu requires a bit more I think
